instructions: Open the Google Duo app on your phone, tablet, or Chromebook, and make sure you're signed in with your Google account. If you've never opened the app before, you will need to grant it permissions to access your phone's microphone, camera, and contacts. Swipe up from the bottom of the screen to open the contacts view. Google Duo Group 1 Google Duo Group 2 Source: Jeramy Johnson / Android Central Tap on the contact or group you want to leave a message for. Tap on the red circular Message button at the bottom right of the screen to record your video message. Screenshot 20200323 095237 Duo Google Duo Video Message 1 Source: Jeramy Johnson / Android Central In addition to video messages, you can elect to send a voice message only or you can type a note and send it as a text message .
